name: The Dumb Kid's Job
description:
STORY:

You are Bond, a secret agent (one of the best, according to him..)

This time, he has a new mission: help Junior, the boss’s son, to finish his mission.

If Bond want to keep Junior alive, he will have to do everything beforehand.. Thankfully, he can count on Ann to help him !

CONTROLS:

Move with WASD / ZQSD

Aim with MOUSE RIGHT, then shoot with MOUSE LEFT

Interact with buttons, doors, controls panels with MOUSE LEFT

Next line of dialog with SPACE

NOTES:

  • Don’t worry if you don’t hear the music, there isn’t any
  • Engine: Superpowers
  • Font: Indoscreen

Day+1 patch: I made some changes to the game, in order to make it more accessible and pleasant to play.

  • Maps memory optimization
  • Added French translation and keyboard layout (AZERTY)
  • Added “easy” difficulty level, so you can play with the difficulty appropriate for you.

SOCIAL:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/YvanorDev

uTip: https://utip.io/yvanor (Thanks !)
